description: This file implements checkpoint and wakeup functionalities for process hibernation, managing process metadata and handling process state transitions with assertions and memory management.

methods.name: uint32_t HibernateProcess(const uint32_t timeout,const pid_t pid,const char data_dir[],const char volatile_dir[],void ** storage)
methods.description: Stores process ID in metadata, prepares process for hibernation, and possibly initiates checkpointing.

methods.name: uint32_t WakeupProcess(const uint32_t timeout,const pid_t pid,const char data_dir[],const char volatile_dir[],void ** storage)
methods.description: Restores process state from checkpoint data and resumes process execution.

ctags.signature: (const uint32_t timeout,const pid_t pid,const char data_dir[],const char volatile_dir[],void ** storage)
